title: Potential Solution to Prevent Hurricane Damage

content.description: A beach community was recently negatively affected by a hurricane. Community leaders are looking for a potential solution to prevent damage from future hurricanes. Below is a list of their concerns as well as how important each issue is to the community.
content.question: Community Concerns Concern Level Wave action Low Beachfront development Low Nearshore aquaculture Low Health of nearby coral reef Moderate Roosting bird species High Storm surge threat High Which of the following solutions would best address the issues of greatest concern in the community?

topic.text: 8.4: Human Impacts on Wetlands and Mangroves

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
